Text: Must be ripped since Encore only is an almost full DVD
Great release, this is very handy!
This thing is working for you guys?  Is it the 'fixed' version do you know?

yes, ripped versions of some apps, only way it would fit onto a dvd.
the 'fix' for this release is just to remove a few MBs from the ISO so that its small enough to fit on both a CD-R and a CD+R.
to remove the extra MBs, you should find this release:
"All.Adobe.DVD.Optional.Fix-XiSO"
which is only a few MBs itself.
